mapper.delete: DELETE FROM question WHERE question_no = #{questionNo} AND test_no = #{testNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question ( test_no, question_idx , question_title) VALUES ( #{testNo}, #{questionIdx}, #{questionTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT t.test_no testNo , t.test_title testTitle , t.test_date testDate , t.teacher_no teacherNo , q.question_no qNo , q.question_idx qIdx , q.question_title qTitle FROM question q INNER JOIN test t ON q.test_no=t.test_no WHERE t.test_no=1
